ThingDef.label: archotech ear
ThingDef.description: An advanced artificial ear built by an archotech. It looks and feels like natural flesh, but it's harder to damage than plasteel. Even if it is harmed, it repairs itself over time. Its internal workings are a mystery to all human minds.
